title: Klein Tools 206LR-PKLC Heritage 206LR-P 6-Inch Ergo Bent Trimmer with Large Rings
description: Ergo style bent trimmer. Extra large bottom handle allows the operator to use all four fingers in handles. Added comfort, added leverage. 7 1/4" overall length; 2 3/4" cut length. Hot forged, carbon steel blades. Chrome over nickel plated. Soft coated handles.
